GeneralInfo.Name: RecordedSeriesManager
GeneralInfo.Author: Scrounger
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
RecordedSeriesManager is a TvServer plugin for MediaPortal.
RecordedSeriesManager monitors changes of your recorded series (= records with season- and episodenumber !!!). If it find changes, the plugin checks, if the recorded series filename has the correct series formating rule (like you have configured in the TvServer Configuration). The plugin will correct the filename and store the changes in your records database. The plugin will also found duplicated recorded series, because they have also a filename with wrong series formating rule. The plugin offers additionally an existing file handler, where you can configure what happens if a file with correct series formating rule still exist.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: == Version 0.7.1.7 beta == * background timer bug fixed

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.
